title: Current Members
description: Visiting researchers currently collaborating with Tickle the Surface research group.

items.name: Dr. Anibal Boscoboinik
items.description: Materials Scientist at the Center for Functional Nanomaterials, Brookhaven National Laboratory, and Adjunct Professor at Stony Brook University. Specializes in surface science and nanotechnology.

items.name: Laiba Bilal
items.description: Graduate student at Stony Brook University with a focus on surface science research.

items.name: Sayantani Sikder
items.description: Graduate student specializing in surface science experiments and instrumentation development.

items.name: Steven Arias
items.description: Research Associate at Brookhaven National Laboratory with expertise in materials science.

items.name: Eliseo Perez Gomez
items.description: Graduate student involved in surface science research projects.

items.name: Victoria Lily Su
items.description: Graduate student focusing on the development of new surface science experiments.
